description: Taking inspiration from archival materials relating to shows and performers at Bartholomew Fayre, discover how to go beyond the historical sources to illuminate hidden queer lived experiences, and create poetry and flash fiction that brings your creative interpretations to life. Led by Nick Field.

factsheet.heading: Bartholomew Fayre and Lived Experiences
paragraphs: Taking inspiration from archival materials relating to shows and performers at Bartholomew Fair, discover how to go beyond the historical sources to illuminate hidden queer lived experiences, and create poetry and flash fiction that brings your creative interpretations to life. Led by Nick Field.

location.address: Smithfield Rotunda Garden, West Smithfield, EC1A 9PT

name: Bartholomew Fayre: The Inspirational Archive
